meanings.definition: To detach mentally or consider separately.
meanings.sent1: I need to prescind the main idea from the details in this article.
meanings.sent2: It is important to prescind emotions from logical decision-making.
meanings.sent3: Trying to prescind my thoughts from the upcoming vacation is proving to be a challenge.
meanings.sent4: She tried to prescind herself from the chaos of the situation.
meanings.sent5: In order to focus, I must prescind distractions from my mind.

meanings.sent1: During the meeting, I had to prescind from checking my phone.
meanings.sent2: It is difficult to prescind from worrying about the future.
meanings.sent3: I attempted to prescind from the delicious smell of freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent4: She had to prescind from the enticing offer in order to stay focused.
meanings.sent5: In order to meditate effectively, one must prescind from external distractions.
